subject: Cricket (Game)
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Sachin Tendulkar's decision implies that he intends to continue in five-day tests, taking a career that began when he was 16 up to and beyond his 40th birthday next March.
snippet: Sachin Tendulkar's decision implies that he intends to continue in five-day tests, taking a career that began when he was 16 up to and beyond his 40th birthday next March.
